author: JustFocus
install_msg:
You just installed my cog!
Use `[p]PDB` to Look into the DB.
Add information to your bio with `[p]bio [field] [value]`
Use `[p]db @[user]` to see someone else's entrees
Use `[p]dbfields` to list available fields
Use `[p]dbfields add [field]` and `[p]dbfields remove [field]` to add and remove fields
User `[p]dbsearch [field]` to search all entrees for a field



Use `[p]dbpurge` to reset your db entrees,
Use `[p]dbreset` to reset your db entree,
Use `[p]dbalert` to alert when your profile is in db
name: PDB
description: Add player information and lookup information others have shared.
